info.title: Bitly
info.description: Shorten, Share and Track your links with the Bitly APIs.

parameters.name: longUrl
parameters.description: a long URL to be shortened (example: http://betaworks.com/)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: (optional) refers to a preferred domain; either bit.ly, j.mp, or bitly.com, for users who do NOT have a custom short domain set up with bitly. This affects the output value of url. The default for this parameter is the short domain selected by each user in his/her bitly account settings. Passing a specific domain via this parameter will override the default settings for users who do NOT have a custom short domain set up with bitly. For users who have implemented a custom short domain, bitly will always return short links according to the user's account-level preference.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Given a long URL, returns a bitly short URL.

parameters.name: shortUrl
parameters.description: Short URL to be expanded.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Refers to one or more bitly hashes.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Given a bitly URL or hash (or multiple), returns the target (long) URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: One or more long URLs to lookup.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: This is used to query for a bitly link based on a long URL.

parameters.name: shortUrl
parameters.description: Refers to one or more short URLs.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Refers to one or more bitly hashes.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: This is used to return the page title for a given bitly link.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: (optional) the bitly login of the user whose info to look up. If not given, the authenticated user will be used.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) integer in the range 1 to 100 -  default: 50, specifying the max number of results to return.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: (optional) timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: (optional) timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: (optional)  the user for whom to retrieve history entries (if different from authenticated user).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Returns entries from a user's link history in reverse chronological order.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: minute, hour, day, week or month

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: (optional) an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup
parameters.description: (optional) true or false. Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's most-clicked bitly links (ordered by number of clicks) in a given time period.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: a bltly link.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: minute, hour, day, week or month

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: (optional) an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup
parameters.description: (optional) true or false. Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

parameters.name: rollup

get.description: Returns metrics about the countries referring click traffic to a single bitly link.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: a bltly link.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: (optional) an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14)

parameters.description: (optional) 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup

get.description: Returns metrics about the pages referring click traffic to a single bitly link.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: a bltly link.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: minute, hour, day, week or month

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: (optional) an integer hour offset from UTC (-14 to 14)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) 1 to 1000 (default=100).

parameters.name: rollup
parameters.description: (optional) true or false. Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Returns metrics about a shares of a single link.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: string to query for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (optional) the maximum number of links to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (optional) which result to start with (defaults to 0).

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: (optional) show links active in this city (ordered like country-state-city, e.g. us-il-chicago).

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: (optional) favor results in this language (two letter ISO code).

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: (optional) restrict results to this web domain.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Search links receiving clicks across bitly by content, language, location, and more.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Returns phrases that are receiving an uncharacteristically high volume of click traffic, and the individual links (hashes) driving traffic to pages containing these phrases.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

get.description: Returns phrases that are receiving a consistently high volume of click traffic, and the individual links (hashes) driving traffic to pages containing these phrases.
